alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 03 at 1:02PM CST until January 03 at 1:30PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CST FOR NORTH CENTRAL CHILTON AND EAST CENTRAL BIBB COUNTIES... At 102 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Ashby, or 8 miles west of Jemison, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Calera, Jemison, Brierfield Ironworks Park, Ashby and Minooka Park. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
